Contacts¶

The Teflo Tool¶

Framework Community¶

Information on framework updates can be found on the teflo-watchers list. Updates will also be on the ci-infra-list. If you have any questions, need help developing your scenarios, or how best to use teflo to fit your use case, we encourage you to reach out to the teflo-watchers list as we have a diverse community of users that can offer insight on some of these questions.

Please subscribe here.

Logging Issues with Teflo¶

First, verify that the issue you are facing has not been logged, by looking at unresolved teflo issue.

If the issue has not been logged, please log the issue using the following options in JIRA:

  • Project = CIDER(CID)
  • Component/s = Teflo

When filing the jira take a look out our Support and Release policy. It provides some help information on what information to provide in the ticket and an SLA.

Authors and Maintainers¶

Please feel free to reach out to any of the developers of teflo, particularly the CCIT maintainers, if you have any questions.
